question: Which Ministry has launched the field assessment of 6th Swachh Survekshan?
option3: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs has launched the field assessment for 6th edition of the Swachh Survekshan 2021.
The Swachh Survekshan commenced in the year 2016 as a competition enhancing framework to encourage cities to achieve high standards of sanitation under the Swatch Bharat Mission.
